```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```

#Data Import

```{r, message=F}
top2017 <- read.csv("featuresdf.csv")
top2018 <- read.csv("top2018.csv")
```

#Data Transformation

```{r}
top1 <- mutate(top2017,
               year=2017)
top2 <- mutate(top2018,
               year=2018)
top <- rbind(top1, top2)
write_csv(top,"TOP.CSV")
```
